name: Survarium
description: Survarium is a post-apocalyptic online FPS game. If you are looking for a shooter where skills matter, look no further! The opposing players and deadly anomalies will never stop you on the way to victory, right? Then start playing now for free!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (Service Pack 1), Windows 8.1 (64 bit) Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Phenom II X4 / AMD FX / AMD Ryzen Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce: GTX 650 / GT 1030 or Radeon R7 250X DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 16 GB available space Additional Notes:
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Phenom II X4 / AMD FX / AMD Ryzen Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce: GTX 960 / GTX 1050Ti or AMD Radeon: R9 280X / RX 460 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 16 GB available space Additional Notes:

reviews.review_text: Having read a lot of negative reviews I went into playing Survarium with little expectation to its entertainment value. What I ended up with was quite a suprise for me and a couple friends who tried it with me. I am a big fan of FPS games and I have played a lot of them from original CS too current day Modern Warfare and BF4. Lately a lot of FPS games have bored the hell out of me and I have been shying away from them. This game brought me right back. I expected a lot of P2W and crashing but what I got was a well thought out 8v8 team death match. The way in which they set up the skill points/weapons/items/perks is the way it should be done. If you are thinking about trying this game please do. Do not get me wrong survarium has its issues as all games do but for a free FPS game this is the best set up for on that I have ever seen.
A post-apocalyptic game that ACTUALLY DOESNT HAVE ♥♥♥♥ING ZOMBIES!!!

Ok first things first - EARLY ACESS, NOT COMPLETE!!!! many have slated this game, saying how it does not yet have all the features, not fully optimized, has bugs and needs balancing.  Well thats because it is yet to be completed. It states that.The pvp is currently being used by the creators to polish andfine tune the engine, beforethey release the open world element to the game. Which has been stated it will be this year. Ignore the hates as this game is free, so u can try it for yourself and have nothing to lose. just give it a try.  So far i am actually really enjoying it, its a fun challange. And because i understand it is a in development game, i can enjoy.  Key things they have really done a good job with is the sounds, visuals and great atmosphere.   Unlike the few haters who have WRONGLY JUDGED, I am very optimistic, and belive that this game has very strong potential, just needs us to play and enjoy.  Hope this helps
great fps some bugs but expected needs updating as there is a memory leak and frame rate drops but its enjoyable
Still better than COD

This game is nice. ive recently started playing it so there isnt much to judge. the graphics are astonishing for a free game. the mechanics of the game are pretty good, the gameplay is simple but lots of people tend to find amusement in playing it. I would recommend this game if you have a moderatley good computer and some time to spare.

For a game just coming out of Alpha and done from scratch on an in-house developed engine it's impressive.   Not yet the sandbox Stalker-like game we're waiting for, but hopefully the firefights will be more dynamic than in DayZ.
I played the game before it was on Steam. Very good game! Im lovin' it!
meh..... looks really cool but............. its just like every other shooter at the moment

Survarium is a pvp game not a open world survival game, so if your looking for a game like Day Z or RUST this is not for you.  the game is alright if you want something new for a little bit, but i dont see it becoming very popular. the graphics are not as good as in the screenshots and even if they were you wouldent be able to play because the game will give you bad FPS even if you are on low. the charecter models in the game all look the same and spaz out everywhere. the time to kill is very short, and having high rate of fire guns in the game does not help. everyone is just running around with sub machine guns shooting you twice and killing you. however there are some good moments when you are having s sniper fight or something but the full auto guns are a little OP. i cant tell if you will like it or not but you wont know if you dont try it.
All S.T.A.L.K.E.R fans will find what they have been looking for a long time :)

Maxed out the Black Market faction in reasonable time, and can honestly say it's a fun little game. PvP is only for testing initial gaming mechanics, and is the only gaming mode available at the moment. Be warned, there is no free roam. NO. FREE. ROAM. Period. This is, at the moment, just a soviet bloc CS. Free roam should be implemented at the end of the year, or so I hear.
Misleading title. Was expecting a H1Z1 type of game, got COD.
Just like every FPS. Just teams vs teams were higher level players win. Also, the games only 'average' when you have a $2,000 pc! SOOOOO LAGGY!
Very good, now is only TDM but Im exited for the Freeplay mode, enjoy!!!!
Don't even try to hit that ''Play Now'' button, it doesn't deserve the time...

At the current state of Survarium, it is quite a dull game. The game has been in 'Alpha/Beta' for at least 2 years now, and it still doesn't look like it's really going anywhere, maybe just slowly. The current TDM game mode is fun, and it gives you a good taste of what is hopefully to come in the Free Mode and Co-op mode. As this is a game that is in Alpha, it plays as well as I would expect, the options for your character are quite limited, and the game appears to be mostly P2W, as the majority of items are only purchasable by gold.   I would only recommend this game to those who like to get involved in a game's community, and can help and contribute to the game itself. If you want to play a game that you could put hours into and have a blast with your friends, I would not recommend this game at the state that it is currently in. Wait until at least the Co-op or Free Mode are released, then it should get better. Vostok need to get their act together, it's been quite a few years since the game has been available to the public, and the only game mode is still TDM...
this game is a mix between cod waw and battlefield but its fun ^^
This game sucks, don't waste your time like I did.

I think people are giving this game a lot of crap when in all honesty it's really a good game I enjoy it, it does have some P2W aspects but doesn't Heros and Generals? People still play that.
Beautiful graphics, but that is about it though... Try teamkilling. There are no penalties, so what do you have to lose? Recommended if you enjoy teamkilling, and that's about it.

Though weapon balancing is absolutely an issue at this point, I like the game very much. Not feeling the pay to win at all at the moment. Getting fairly good scores and playing absolutely for free. You need to bite the bullet and go that extra mile to unlock some guns, but it's absolutely worth it.  I also posted in the forum about the balancing issues and the devs made a very quick response, so kudos to them for listening to their playerbase!!!  If you like some good ol' bolt action rifling in a post apocalyptic setting, then this is definetly for you!

-You see ivan when you shoot horizontally raining boolets you shall never miss.  Only good thing about this game is sounds and graphics, everything else is horrible. The atmosphere is just so epic, sitting with a rifle in a bush, listening to grasshoppers and waiting for a vladimir to get on my sight -BOOOOoooommm *echoing*. Played since v0.22 and no change since, it takes forever to shoot, lack of controls and the anti-aliasing is horrible, lot of bugs too. 10/10 FEGELEIN! FEGELEIN! FEGELEIN!
Good game if you like spawn killing, low resoltuon windowed view and crappy animations.
crashes as soon as I hit log in with steam so i cant exactly reccomenda game i cant play

I wanted a good stalker like game and instead I got a coladutyfied stalker multiplayer that feels nothing like stalker (even its items that are very similar to stalker is not enough to bring me back to play more of this game) and turned out to be a boring f2p pay to win game  I was really looking forward to this game and followed its developement some years now, but as this game started to mature, it was starting to turn into a boring run n' gun f2p/p2w game which I have seen and played these types of games countless times. I won't mind playing bad games from time to time if they are fun to play and don't ruin the experience too much with its bad developement, but this game is not one of them. I tried to play longer to see if can get some enjoyment out of it but it didn't. Its just came down to a boring and uninspired gameplay which I don't have much attention span for to keep me playing.  Avoid it like you would avoid getting hit by the emission or you will be consumed by the emission than you will become the servant of the C-Consciousness like so many were before you.  I would strongly not recommand this game to anyone, and should be forgotten by all of the stalker fan of its existance don't care if its in beta, if its not a fun game from a beta state than there is no way it can get any better in its finished state.

Its not what you would think it is yet. They have released it before I would even say its early access. You only get access to a few weapons, but thats not the problem. The only game mode you can do is pvp on a few maps. Some people would be alright with that but the description describes it as a dayz/h1z1 type of game. I am disappointed that they still havnt reached that target but they have also put it in the description which will make more people download it. Although, as a pvp fps game its actually an alright game. Its realistic and you can bleed out. They graphics are decent and the game is good. My rating on the game would probably be a 3/10 as they just havnt done enough to release it yet.

Cannot play the game after putting it in full screen mode.  Always blinks a black background and my desktop background.  Im Uninstalling and then Reinstalling to see if it will help. Currently, i say dont play this until you actually start playing the game.

Now if the devs add a kill cam and make it brighter, I would play it then! But don't play it till then.
Idk But i love this game, And its beta dont be hating now! Its so much fun if u get deep into this game its hard but fun!

They NEED to add customization like scopes, lazer poiter, extended mags and most deffinatly silencers! If they do, this game will become 10/10! Still pretty cool, the maps are awesome, it reminded me of the supergood'old Modern Warfare and Medal of Honor Allied Assault.

Really nice game !! :-)

Survarium to me feels like another 'cheap' first person shooter, however, Vostok games have achieved a different style of gameplay with gamemodes that I haven't ever really come across before.  Now the feedback after just playing it about 5 minutes ago. (03/04/2015)  I can easily say that the graphics to this game is rather beautiful, however I was not entirely impressed with the mechanics. I believe the game has got potential, but the issue that got to me was the character controller felt a bit too slow on user inputs and the gravity (physics) seemed a bit low according to the movements of when I jumped off cliffs.  I respect Votok Games for making the game, Free-to-Play, but as a Indie Game Developer myself, I would say well done on creating this wonderful project, but I wouldn't play it yet until some polishing was contributed towards the project, but like again, this is a Beta stage and we can all only hope that the full release will have some exciting implementations as well as improvements to current features.

this game isn't that bad. but they should have kept working on it, i doubt that by releasing it this early it helped the devs make much money.  so, this game is very pretty, the maps are wonderful but there are a lot of texture/shadow flashing, probably due to my crossfire setup (as some point you get used to it and remember never to build such a pc again)  the shooting / aiming could be better, a bit too floaty. and at about 50~55 stable fps, my aim was lagging, something felt really bad about it. lowered the settings, hit about 60 stable fps and that lag was gone. no idea what it was (or the fps meter was lying to me)  i'd play some more in a year i guess, if this ever gets better, and i wouldn't mind changing my review then.

this game is garbage  pros: nothing,none,no,nada,yada yada  cons: everything this is trash waste of space would not recommend if you want to get rid off this game, i say burn it with fire this is not 10/10

I think i would buy the game, but not the 'premium' and stuff account that in my opinion destroy the pleasure of this game. It is still a beta, maybe some evolution to come in the economics model.
